meta.job_title: Associate Scientist I / Associate Systems Integration Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design experiments and testing schemes, analyze data, write protocols and reports, and present results to a cross-functional team.
Support Reagent manufacturing and conduct investigations on internal non-conformances and customer complaints related to Reagents.
Assist in developing/improving Reagent manufacturing processes and products.
Demonstrate strong problem-solving and analytical skills and be a team player.
Familiar with process and test method validations.
Have knowledge of GMP, ISO, and FDA regulations and audits.
Excellent communication skills and ability to perform under pressure to meet project deadlines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in STEM field (biological sciences, chemistry, technological sciences, or biomedical engineering)
